dict.acceptation: 政治家；政客，玩弄权术者；<蔑>政客，<美>政治贩；

sent.orig: I'm not a politician myself, but I take some interest in what's going on.
sent.trans: 我本人并不是政治家，但是我对于局势的发展却有点兴趣。

sent.orig: He is a very famous free lance politician in this country.
sent.trans: 他是这个国家很有名的无党派政_治家。

sent.orig: As a politician Mr Chávez is a cool strategist, though a sometimes reckless tactician.
sent.trans: 身为政治家的查韦斯先生是一位非常冷静的战略家，尽管有时也是一位不计后果的战术家。

sent.orig: The politician jabbered away about matters of which he had no knowledge.
sent.trans: 那个政客反反复复地侈谈自己一无所知的事情。

sent.orig: Mr Obama has inspired more passionate devotion than any modern American politician.
sent.trans: 奥巴马所激发的热情比当今美国任何一位政客都要多。
